Image.Alt: A red patch with a red background and a red and gold phoenix with a thunder bold in the center of its chest. It says "Twin Rivers Council 2003 Rotary Scout Reservation".
Image.Caption: The patch scouts and adults earned by camping at Rotary in 2003.

Image.Alt: 24 scouts and adults posing for a photo in front of a big outdoor fireplace.
Image.Caption: Troop photo at Rotary Scout Reservation in 2003.
